votebox.middle.view

Interface IViewManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewManager

    public interface IViewManager
    Other classes that make use of the ViewManager should program to this abstraction, and not to the concrete ViewManager class. This allows for much easier testing.

        int getSize()
        Get the current size.
        Returns:
        This method returns the current size of images that the view manager is asking to have displayed.
